Package org.zoolu.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Logger
    A generic message logger.
    TimerListener
    Listens for timer timeout.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64
    Base64 encoder and decoder.
    BitString
    String of bits (0 or 1).
    BitStringBuffer
    Buffer of bit strings.
    BitUtils
    Class that collects static methods for dealing with binary materials.
    ByteUtils
    Class that collects static methods for dealing with binary materials.
    Clock
    A clock that maintains a time variable.
    DateFormat
    Class DateFormat can be used to format Date information.
    Flags
    Gets the values of command-line options/parameters.
    LoggerLevel
    Log level.
    LoggerWriter
    Simple logger that writes log messages onto a logfile, or standard output, or Writer, or OutputStream or PrintStream.
    MD5
    MD5 hash algorithm.
    MessageDigest
    Generic hash/message-digest algorithm.
    Parser
    Class Parser allows the parsing of String objects.
    Random
    Class Random collects some static methods for generating random numbers and other stuff.
    SystemUtils
    Class that collects various methods and objects.
    Timer
    A Timer is a simple object that fires the TimerListener.onTimeout(Timer) method when the time expires.
